entry.def: Curlers are small plastic or metal tubes that women roll their hair round in order to make it curly.

example.ex: ...a woman with her hair in curlers.

means.word_mean: 1. a mechanical device consisting of a cylindrical tube around which the hair is wound to curl it;

sentences.sentence: "a woman with her head full of curlers is not a pretty sight"
